prompt: Enable systemd-based initrd on weller. Add boot.initrd.systemd.enable = true to hosts/weller/default.nix in the Bootloader section (after the existing boot.loader settings, before the kernel params). This is the first step toward supporting Bluetooth in stage 1 (initrd) so the Kinesis BLE keyboard works at the LUKS passphrase prompt. PR title: 'weller: switch to systemd-based initrd'
